categories: Category:Military units and formations of the Imperial Army (Sith Empire)

nodes.text: Alpha Squad was a military unit of the reconstituted Sith Empire stationed on Quesh around 3642 BBY. They were send to retrieve combat adrenals from Republic forces, but were outmatched and twelve out of thirteen members were killed in action. Sergeant Molvar was the only survivor. Injured, he made his way to a nearby Imperial outpost and asked a fellow Imperial to finish his mission.
